Package player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
player.Camera
player.Player
public class Player extends Camera
This class represents the player, a type of camera that moves along the maze, collides with Walls.
Version:
05262024
Author:
Dhruv Solanki, Ohm Bhakta, Yujun Lee

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()
      Creates a new instance of a player.

    • Player

      public Player(Maze maze)
      Creates a new instance of a player
      Parameters:
      maze - the maze the Player interacts

    • Player

      public Player(float w, float h, float d, float speed, float xSensitivity, float ySensitivity, float friction, float fov, float viewDistance, Weapon weapon, Maze maze)
      Creates a new instance of a player
      Parameters:
      w - Width of the player
      h - Height of the player
      d - Depth of the player
      speed - How fast the player moves
      xSensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the x-axis
      ySensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the y-axis
      friction - The amount of friction the player experiences while moving
      fov - The player's field of view
      viewDistance - How far the player can look in the distance
      weapon - the weapon the player holds
      maze - the Maze the player interacts

  • Method Details

    • givePlayerWeapon

      public void givePlayerWeapon(boolean weap, processing.core.PApplet g)
      Gives a weapon to the Player
      Parameters:
      weap - true if the weapon is a Blaster, false if the weapon is a Sword
      g - the PApplet in which the Player interacts
